Regenerating drones' brains will be interlinked, forming an organic computer core to supplement the main core.

description: Most species are still exploring the capabilities of warp drives. We, however, have discovered a new layer of subspace that might allow travel at greatly increased speeds. 'Transwarp Space', as we have called it, does not follow the same topology as normal space. Modifying our warp drives to tunnel into transwarp space is the first step in exploring the shortcuts around the galaxy that it offers.
name: Transwarp

description: Low gravity environments make our lives much too difficult. Some ships have tried to use centrifugal forces generated by spinning ship segments to simulate gravity. This is moderately effective but wildly complicates starship design. By pooling everything we've learnt about gravity thus far, it's hoped that a much simpler way of generating a gravity field will soon be found.
name: Artificial Gravity

description: By utilising energy filaments arranged in a net like pattern we can create an almost impenetrable web around a target. Once the web is complete, it would become self generating.
name: Tholian Web

description: Travelling at high speeds across the quadrant has its own navigational problems from micrometeoroids and other small debris that would destroy a small vessel at a high enough velocity. The deflector dish projects a field to push these particles out of the way of a vessel, and can be adapted for minor defensive purposes.
name: Deflector Fields

description: Modulating the deflector field to minimise resistance could allow for an adaptive deflector field.

description: Gravimetric logic banks cross check and discard illogical data sets allowing for improved sensor output.
name: Vulcan Gravimetric Sensor Techniques

description: Strong force field technology ensures the integrity of Tellarite vessels when arguments break out.
name: Tellarite Force Field Techniques

description: Improvements to our targeting and control allow for increased utility.
name: Laser Weaponry

description: It seems that a calm mind conquers all. With some adaptation inspired by religious symbolism to the weapon consoles onboard our ships, we can increase their effectiveness. Furthermore phased hand weapons out an airlock can increase our damage output by 20%.
name: Dervish Device

description: A device that dampens energy use. As a weapon this will greatly reduce a ship or stations energy output, starving their systems of much needed energy.
name: Energy Dissipator

description: Basic plasma-based pulse cannons. Due to the importance of mastering plasma for building warp-capable starships, these are often one of the first viable directed-energy weapons a civilisation will develop. Although able to break up asteroids and meteors, their low range and yield hinders their effectiveness against starship armour and shields. Wise users seek an upgrade at the first opportunity.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Pulse Cannon
name: Pulse Cannons

description: Accurate and reasonably powerful nadion particle beams. While most phasers appear yellow or orange, the higher frequencies used by Andorian phaser nadion emitters cause a stylishly blue output.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Andorian Phaser
name: Co-Efficient Phasers

description: A hybrid nadion/heavy particle beam that works to weaken and smash apart the atomic structure of the target. The increased engineering complexity over a nadion-only phaser makes this a rarer, albeit potentially more potent, design.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Particle Phaser
name: Particle Phasers

description: Unique type of phaser which seeks to maximise destructive efficiency and minimise wear on the nadion emitter. The phaser beam oscillates slightly, aiming to introduce a disruptive interference pattern in the strong and weak nuclear forces between two locations. When successful, a larger area loses atomic cohesion than would be possible with a standard phaser.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Wave Disruptor
name: Wave Disruptors

description: Phasers fire nadions, an artificially created particle, at their target. Nadion particles interfere with the nuclear forces that bind atoms together. Unusually versatile, nadion beams can be adapted for many uses such as heating, drilling, stunning, killing, disintegrating, and more.
name: Phasers

description: Phase weapons, or phase-modulated energy weapons, are a type of directed-energy particle weapon that utilized a phase modulator to control the blast yield.
name: Phaser Technology Principles

description: Powerful disruptors which use tetryons to rip apart the atomic structure of the target. The discovery of tetryons, a subatomic particle that is only stable in subspace, is a recent occurrence. We anticipate that further investigation will lead us to designs for more potent designs.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Tetryonic Disruptor
name: Tetryonic Disruptors

description: With the introduction of exotic particles into the disruptor generator matrix we might be able to develop an improved impact reaction from our disruptors. These disruptors should take over some of the plasma weapon traits like plasma's intense heat potential.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Plasma Disruptor
name: Plasma Disruptor

description: Disruptor cannons rapidly fire weak energy discharges to vaporize their target. Although they lack accuracy, the low energy of each shot reduces the damage lost with a miss. This means that they have a higher potential damage output than some of the more accurate weapon systems.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Disruptor Cannon
name: Disruptor Cannon

description: The basic principles of disruptor technology is that disruptors cause damage by exciting the molecular bonds of targets to such great extents that those bonds are weakened, and/or broken, by the energies emitted, which often manifest as explosive force
name: Disruptor Technology Principles

description: Cannons which fire bursts of compressed plasma. Upon impact, the plasma disrupts shields and vaporizes hull plating. While not an accurate weapon, their high rate of fire makes them effective in combat. Ships can typically mount several cannons due to their small size.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Plasma Arc
name: Plasma Cannon

description: Our current generation of weapons are cumbersome, power hungry and destructive. They are imperfect. A new weapon has been devised, a high-powered laser cutting beam, that may destroy a target with ease but also allows us to dissect them for easier assimilation.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Cutting Beam
name: Weaponised Cutting Beam

description: Biopulse weapons can be grown that fire powerful energetic bolts from the hull of our living bioships that could be destructive to enemy ships.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Bio-Pulse Weapon
name: Bio-Pulse Weapon

description: A metreon is a particle which can take the form of both radiation and gas. Metreon particles have been demonstrated to react with dark matter and even to have temporal properties. In their gaseous form, metreon particles are extremely volatile and are easily ignited via weapons fire.

description: Firing bursts of anti-protons, these cannons are capable of partially dissolving their target at a subatomic level. Energy released from the annihilation of the targets protons by the anti-protons causes a heating effect, pushing the remaining particles apart causing further damage.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Anti-Proton Beam
name: Anti-Proton Beam

description: The principles of antimatter weapons are to utilise devices using antimatter as a power source, propellant, or explosive.
name: Antimatter Weaponry Principles

description: Polarons are a quasiparticle. With our current understanding of physics, we believe that we can create a directional beam that consists of ions, and electrons acting as polarons. If the polaron is strong enough, we hope to induce a kind of 'charge shock' in the atomic structure of the target. A powerful enough 'shock' should cause the atomic structure to disintegrate.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Polaron Beam
name: Polaron Beam

description: A quantum resonance signature is a specific measurement that exists for all forms of matter. Calculations suggest that utilising subatomic particles to disrupt the quantum resonance of a target could be extremely beneficial to our military units.

description: Our efforts to cure the phage have resulted in some interesting byproducts, one of which is the thermic charge. Originally an industrial tool that heats and melts metals in the presence of pressurized oxygen to create the very high temperatures required for cutting, it has been repurposed for starship weaponry.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Hyper-Thermic Charge
name: Thermic Charge

description: Chroniton cannons are ship-mounted weapons utilized by the Krenim, deadly weapons based on temporal science. The chronitons in a blast are capable of passing directly through an enemy's shields, due to the fact that they are in a constant state of temporal flux.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Chroniton Cannon
name: Chroniton Cannon

description: Rapid-fire cannons that fire pulses of tetryon particles. Tetryons are native to subspace; once extruded into normal space they become unstable, making them useful as a weapon. A high rate of fire compensates for a lack of accuracy.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Tetryonic Cannon
name: Tetryonic Cannon

description: A tetryon is a subatomic particle that can only exist in subspace environments. Since these particles are a property of subspace, they become highly energetic and unstable when they are extruded into normal space, occurring by both natural and artificial means, such as with tetryonic weapons.
name: Tetryonic Weapon Principles

description: A field generated from the Undine pilot's mental strength channeled through the living ship creating a powerful defensive field.

description: There may come a time when intellects, vast and cool and unsympathetic, regard our worlds with envy and draw plans against us. We must be ready.
name: Planetary Defenses

description: With new planetary markets comes new opportunities for commerce. Business will be booming.
name: Interplanetary Commerce

description: Large-scale industrial farms growing nutrient-rich produce allows a civilization to grow its population manifold.
name: Industrial Agriculture

description: Calculating required resources and gear required to establish a planetary colony allows us to herd brave pioneers into grand 'colony ships', confident that they will survive the long voyage across the stars to their new home.
name: New World Horizons

description: Proper regulation of our industries and processes will lead to better planetary yields on all fronts, lest we drown ourselves in our own red tape.
name: Planetary Government

description: Pioneering use of holographic technology allows for the creation of artificial environments that seem as authentic as the real world. It is the next step of immersive entertainment.
name: Holo-Entertainment

name: Synaptic Structures

description: The Karemma represent the Gamma Quadrant's major trading entitiy and their trading posts allow the storage of valuable resources.
name: Karemman Trading Posts

description: The Dosi placed great importance on business and were extremely aggressive negotiators, to the point that fatalities were not uncommon.
name: Dosi Hostile Negotiations Tactics

description: Proper regulation of our industries and processes will lead to better planetary yields on all fronts, lest we drown ourselves in our own red tape.
name: Planetary Government

description: The Collective realises that there will never be enough processing power to accomplish everything within note. Shortages occur and surpluses exist. By changing protocols for individual systems, the Collective can ensure optimal efficiency for itself.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Edict: Energy Gathering Protocol Optimisation
name: Optimisation Protocols

description: The systems of the past had one thing in common: if you want to change something rapidly, you have to throw resources at it. Expanding this to a galactic scale may enable short-term substantial boosts to our worlds.
name: Party Competition Theory

description: The SDI project is our proposed strategy to deal with the realities of space travel and the potential for combat with alien races.
name: Strategic Defense Initiative

description: Operating within a zero-gravity environment and out in deep space requires a different kind of training to that used by armed forces in the past.
name: Space Training

description: An entire node dedicated to the protection of nearby nodes and districts.
name: Defense Node

description: The installation of armoured exo-plating to the body of a drone can increase survivability and combat effectiveness.
name: Armoured Exo-Plating

description: The Collective gathers a vast amount of information. We need a way to better assimilate and disseminate this data. Combining our advanced knowledge of computational systems with our cyborg nature, we should be able to create a type of cortical processing subunit. Each unit will be responsible for sorting and distributing data to the drones aboard a vessel or unicomplex.
name: Cortical Processing Unit

description: There may come a time when other races regard our worlds with great envy, and draw plans to attack us. We must be ready.
name: Planetary Defenses

description: Creating dedicated headquarters for all levels of military operations shapes an efficient fleet, and lays a better foundation for future military training.
name: Combat Training

description: Humanity has undergone countless horrors over the centuries but still endures with a brighter future than ever.
name: Human Perseverance

description: The D'jarra is the Bajoran caste system, used by the Bajorans to create a stratified social hierarchy. Everyone is born into a specific caste of D'jarras based on their family, determining their occupation.
name: The D'jarra

description: Armed ships owned by private individuals have been used in the past to bolster navies, as long as they are issued the correct letter of marque.
name: Privateer Corps

description: The Romulan Senate is the main governing body of the Romulan Star Empire, seated in the Senate chamber located on the planet Romulus.
name: Romulan Senate

description: Ferengi see the universe as having 'millions of worlds, all with too much of one, and not enough of the other', with the Great Continuum flowing through them all like a mighty river, from have to want and back again. As such, it was the force that bound the universe together. To get everything you want in life, you had to have your ship navigate the Continuum with entrepreneurial skill and grace.
name: The Great Material River

description: The Rules of Acquisition are the cornerstone of Ferengi culture. A list of numbered aphorisms that describe how to do business, exemplified by rules such as Rule 1, 'Once you have their money, you never give it back'.
name: Ferengi Bar Association

description: The Obsidian Order is the primary intelligence agency of the Cardassian Union.

description: The Central Command is the military authority of the Cardassian Union. Officially, it reports to the civilian Detapa Council, but unofficially, it rules the Cardassian Union.
name: Central Command

description: Cardassia First, above all else. Cardassians must work together to form a perfect Union, and any dissidents or alien influences must be crushed.
name: Cardassia First

description: The High Council is the legislature and ruling body of the Klingon Empire, containing the leaders of the Great Houses of the Empire. It is often tasked with electing a Chancellor to lead the Empire.
name: High Council

description: A Klingon legend speaks of the end of Kahless, the Unforgettable. He instructed his people at the time: 'You are Klingons. You need no one but yourselves. I will go now to Sto-vo-kor. But I promise one day I will return.'
name: The Story of the Promise

description: Kahless created the bat'leth by dropping a length of his hair into some lava from inside the Kri'stak Volcano. Then cooling, shaping, and hardening it in the lake of Lursor. He united the Klingon people with this tale.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Type-3 Order of the Bat'leth
Unlocks Component: Type-4 Order of the Bat'leth
Unlocks Component: Type-5 Order of the Bat'leth
Unlocks Component: Type-6 Order of the Bat'leth
Unlocks Component: Type-7 Order of the Bat'leth
Unlocks Component: Type-8 Order of the Bat'leth
Unlocks Component: Type-9 Order of the Bat'leth
Unlocks Component: Type-10 Order of the Bat'leth
Unlocks Component: Type-12 Order of the Bat'leth
name: Sword of Honour

description: The threat of danger, the taste of fear in the air, the exultation and pride as prey is located and hunted. All these sensations come from the thrill of the hunt - whether you catch the prize at the end is irrelevant, as long as the chase is there.
name: Thrill of the Hunt

description: A legendary Vulcan scientist, philosopher, and logician. He is the father of logical Vulcan as we know it. His teachings turned his people from war to science and philosophy, and would greatly benefit our society in the same manner.
name: Teaching of Surak

description: Skin stretching and toxin purges, the Son'a will do anything to extend their lives.
name: Next Level Plastic Surgery

description: The curation of entire biological species is a hallmark of the insectoid Hur'Q.
name: Curation Techniques

description: The Karemma believe in fair dealing and cautious business practices and regard cheating or gambling to be taboo.
name: Karemman Trade League

description: Tellarites take great pleasure in arguing for the sake of seeing who can come up with better reasoning and supporting evidence. Although this has led to great misunderstandings, once their culture became understood, this concept led to an openness and willingness to confront ideas and the established order, in turn leading to a society governed by reason, rather than tradition and spiritualism.
name: Ritualised Debating

description: The lucrative business of the franchising of popular sports and events across the galaxy is where the Norcadians have developed their wealth.
name: Norcadian Franchise Authority

description: Bynar society is made up of pairs of Bynar forming an individual. Their entire society is implanted with cybernetic implants at birth, with the giant cybernetic consensus being conducted through a central computer mainframe.
name: Central Mainframe

description: Priding themselves on delivering only the highest quality goods, the Orions have a set standard for their business practice. It wouldn't do to deliver substandard rebellious goods.
name: Orion Commodity Standards

description: The trading of ideas has been expanded into the business of the trading of information. Information is ammunition.
name: Yridian Research Brokership

description: Six different intelligent species developed on Xindus. As the result of a brutal civil war between the six species that destroyed the planet, the fragmented survivors have united together under the governance of the Xindi Council.
name: Fragmented Travellers

description: Whilst researching ways of privatising exploitation of resources, our researchers came upon the idea of private companies which can exploit native populations and resources alongside our naval forces. Offering these private charters could be extremely lucrative.
name: Slaver Companies

description: Waste not, want not.
name: Funeral Rites Modernisation

description: This is the way of the Doctrine, as it has always been.
name: Ancient Doctrines

description: We do not sow.
name: Hunter Culture

description: As the rightful rulers of the entire galaxy, the Xeno scum remain a threat and a nuisance to Husnockian dominance.
name: The Danger of the Xeno

description: Improvements in subspace communication channels allow for more coherent administrative direction.
name: Communication Protocol Masters

description: The clans fight amongst themselves, with each Maje acting as First Maje. The council attempts to corral the Majes into some sort of united front.
name: The Maje Council

description: The first members of a species into space are part of their space corps and are often the bravest members of that species.
name: Space Corps

description: Part of a stratified, ordered society is the efficient nature of production. The Cardassians have a unique ability to exploit natural resources efficiently.
name: Efficient Resource Exploitation

description: Designing worthy prey and giving them advantageous terrain to call their own makes the hunt all the more thrilling. The Tosk are the ultimate prey.
name: Oschean Hunting Practices

description: The Royal Imperial Guard has traditions spanning back centuries, since before the first icebreakers travelled across Andoria.
name: Andorian Royal Guard

description: The Undine infiltrators have the ability to become their enemy before attacking, causing havoc and chaos.
name: Undine Infiltration Army

description: The meticulous nature of the Benzites stems from their unerring need to prove themselves better than their peers. This competition results in workers who will not only find problems but come up with solutions for them before presenting the issue.
name: Benzite Efficiency

description: The ancient Gorn Hegemony has created monuments that stretch across the surface of Gornar. Whilst many building techniques are outdated, they are still useful in constructing the new larger buildings upon the surface.
name: Monumental Hegemony

description: The introduction of pheromones into the negotiation process can render opponents very susceptible to the attractiveness of our trade deals.
name: Pheromonal Negotiation

description: The Rigel Commerce Lobby has existed for centuries and allows for a fair and balanced trading platform across many races.
name: Rigel Commerce Lobby

description: The Romulan Senate is centuries old and allowed for the creation of a multiplanet empire. Their procedures for statecraft are vast but cover a multitude of subjects and industries.
name: Imperial Bureaucracy

description: The Suliban have been forced to adapt for many years, where individual needs are discarded in view of what is required for the greater good, and their designs reflect this. Individual ships coming together to form a greater whole.
name: Cell Ship Modularity

description: The centralisation of orbital military power within one authority allows for the substantial command and control over the defensive assets within a system.
name: Orbital High Command

description: At the dawn of the Klingon Empire, five hundred warriors assaulted the Great Hall of Qam-Chee. The city garrison was routed with only Kahless and Lukara holding their ground. Ever since then, highly ritualised processes have been an integral part of Klingon life.
name: Kahless and Lukara

description: The pairing of Bynars allows for a harmonious coupling with vast efficiency gains.
name: Digital Duality

description: The Saurians have long had trading partners within their league, and maintaining those trade links is important for a growing empire.
name: Lyaksti'kton Galactic Trading League

description: The Xepolite Guilds have maintained a substantial sway over the political bodies due to their high standards for their guildsfolk and their strict rules for trading partners.
name: Guild Membership

description: The joint Kriosian and Valtese people can produce great empathic metamorphs as rulers that provide stability and peace for many worlds.
name: Empathic Metamorphs

description: For millenia the Zakdorn have been undefeated, and the Zakdorn with the most potential are trained every day in the Strategos.
name: Superior Strategy

description: The information network of the Yridians is a vast, branching organic business where everything is for sale. To an Yridian, information IS ammunition.
name: Yridian Information Network

description: The vast Tamarian language is made up of allegory, with many stories being passed down from generation to generation. This allows a unique way of expression which can be useful to traders or diplomats alike.
name: Mythological Dictionary

description: The Son'a may not have the most aesthetically pleasing medical care, but their plastic surgery and rejuvenation therapies are second to none.
name: Plastic Surgeon Alliance

description: There will always be those who act against the best wishes of the government, and the commission is designed to root them out before lasting damage can be caused.
name: Commission on Political Traitors

description: Direct connections with other relay stations provide a rapid and mostly secure method of long-distance communication.
name: Peer-to-Peer Protocol Relay Stations

description: The accumulation of material wealth is no longer a priority, but economics of providing the most resources to the most important sectors is still valuable.
name: Commercial Republic

description: The Trill Symbiosis Commission manages the transfer and selection of Joined Trill candidates, who offer a wealth of expertise from their previous hosts.
name: Trill Symbiosis Commission

description: Allowing citizens to own vast tracts of land under contract on new worlds results in many more volunteers wishing to start a new life off world.
name: Valerian Freeholds

description: The different genomes and phenotypes that make up the five main Xindi species requires a unique way of life in order to cope with the different demands placed upon it by each member.
name: Xenogenic Society

description: The ability of the feuding Acamarian clans to unite under one banner, whilst retaining their individuality, is nothing short of remarkably. Applying the same lessons to ourselves could achieve wonders.
name: Acamarian Clan Politics

description: The Bajoran religion is based on a reverence of aliens that live in a nearby wormhole. They make their will known through assorted orbs, codexes, and instructions to members of the Bajoran clergy.
name: Will of the Prophets

description: The Vulcan Expeditionary Group is a Vulcan organization. Members are usually trained at the Vulcan Learning Center and the Vulcan Science Academy.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Type-2 Vulcan Expeditionary Team
Unlocks Component: Type-3 Vulcan Expeditionary Team
Unlocks Component: Type-4 Vulcan Expeditionary Team
Unlocks Component: Type-5 Vulcan Expeditionary Team
Unlocks Component: Type-6 Vulcan Expeditionary Team
Unlocks Component: Type-7 Vulcan Expeditionary Team
Unlocks Component: Type-8 Vulcan Expeditionary Team
Unlocks Component: Type-9 Vulcan Expeditionary Team
Unlocks Component: Type-10 Vulcan Expeditionary Team
Unlocks Component: Type-12 Vulcan Expeditionary Team
Unlocks Component: Type-14 Vulcan Expeditionary Team
Unlocks Component: Type-16 Vulcan Expeditionary Team
Unlocks Component: Type-18 Vulcan Expeditionary Team
name: Vulcan Expeditionary Group

description: Trade and the intricate relationships between currencies have been the most influential forces in Bolian society, and they have developed a deep understanding of these forces, making Bolian institutions highly stable and influential. Some say that it is the Bank of Bolias that holds the true power in the Alpha Quadrant: the fortunes of a trillion sentients wax and wane with its funds rate.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Building: Bank of Bolias Headquarters
Unlocks Building: Bank of Bolias Branch
name: Bolian Economics

description: The 'Code of the Ushaan' is a law regarding death-by-combat and legal instruments, governing the assorted ritual aspects of Andorian society.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Type-2 Andorian Imperial Guard
Unlocks Component: Type-3 Andorian Imperial Guard
Unlocks Component: Type-4 Andorian Imperial Guard
Unlocks Component: Type-5 Andorian Imperial Guard
Unlocks Component: Type-6 Andorian Imperial Guard
Unlocks Component: Type-7 Andorian Imperial Guard
Unlocks Component: Type-8 Andorian Imperial Guard
Unlocks Component: Type-9 Andorian Imperial Guard
Unlocks Component: Type-10 Andorian Imperial Guard
Unlocks Component: Type-12 Andorian Imperial Guard
Unlocks Component: Type-14 Andorian Imperial Guard
Unlocks Component: Type-16 Andorian Imperial Guard
Unlocks Component: Type-18 Andorian Imperial Guard
name: Ushaan Legalisation

description: The communal nature of the Denobulans leads them to be inquisitive about others, and the Xenology Department leads the way in discovering fascinating facts about alien societies.
name: Denobulan Xenology Department

description: Throughout history, Anticans have hunted in packs, for efficient killing and protection. This has extended to their society, as they have become a spacefaring people, tending to group together into packs for protection.
name: Pack Hunting

description: Using their telepathic and empathic nature, Betazoids tend to be able to tell when a business transaction is going awry or one party is ahead of the others.
name: Betazed Empaths Trader Guild

description: The general food and entertainment sources for Caitians can also be used by other species to provide a nutritional, pleasing diet. Caitnip is also very popular amongst the youth.
name: Feline Supplements

description: Deltans are telepathic and empathic, allowing them to sense other people's emotions and administer medical aid by absorbing and minimizing pain. This 'Mind meld anesthesia' means Deltans make excellent medical personnel.
name: Telepathic Pain Absorbtion

description: Commercial enterprises may be used to great effect when carefully regulated, allowing more trade to flow to the most critical parts of the empire.
name: Commercial Enterprise

description: The Bank of Luria holds vast stores of material wealth from around the galaxy. Its secure vaults stretch deep underground, and there are rumours that a river made entirely of liquid latinum flows beneath.
name: Bank of Luria

description: The Selay are used to being hunted, and as such, utilise superior tactics to surround and ambush the packs that attack them.
name: Disrupting the Pack

description: Whilst harvesting lifeforms and small amounts of naturally growing food from pelagic planets is commonplace, the Antedeans take it to a whole other level. Immense kelp farms on their world allow naturally grown kelp to feed millions. Applying their teachings to our own pelagic worlds will allow for the construction of kelp farms.
name: Pelagic Food Cultivation

description: Talarians follow a strict set of traditions and customs and encourage warrior-like behavior amongst their people. They are very competitive with games, tests, and competitions as an important part of their culture. By incorporating some of their teachings, we can improve our readiness.
name: Talarian War Games

description: Pakleds will convert anything they can get their hands on. The Scavenger Guilds specialise in appropriating technology and using it to the benefit of the Pakled Clans.
name: Pakled Scavenger Guilds

description: Communications with alien lifeforms without mutual understanding of the cultures or historical background is a recipe for disaster. By researching possible first contact scenarios, we can at least issue formal instructions on first contact and diplomatic procedures.
name: Xeno Diplomacy

description: Fighting should be left to those who make it their job to do so.
name: Mercenary Corps

description: Teaching others is a base part of our species, and researching advanced techniques to ensure knowledge is passed efficiently is an important part of our expansion as a civilisation.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Building: Orion Institute of Cosmology
Unlocks Building: Denobulan Science Academy I
Unlocks Building: Romulan Astrophysical Academy I
Unlocks Building: University of Culat I
Unlocks Building: Banean Engineering Institute I
name: Advanced Pedagogic Theory

description: Laboratories must be designed with exotic materials in mind, with storage and containment for many of these short-lived and potentially dangerous particles.
name: Exotic Materials Labs

description: Studying the life that arises on other worlds and beyond allows us to understand fundamental aspects of biology that were previously beyond our reach.
name: Xenobiology

description: The Jem'Hadar are a genetically-engineered species. Having a species that's bred for war can lead to a destructive force that can be feared throughout the galaxy, since after all 'Victory is life'. If we are to have such a destructive force, then it also helps to have a chemical that keeps them in check by making them addicted to it, or lest the species that serves us now becomes our conqueror.
name: Jem'Hadar

description: To help ensure the loyalty of our Jem'Hadar soldiers, Ketracel White is required. We have to know where the resources are to produce it. In order to be certain that the White is potent, its ingredients must be highly distilled.
name: Ketracel White Distillation

description: Evolved from marsupials, the Vorta are capable administrators and extremely loyal, if a bit cowardly.
name: Vorta

description: Vast amounts of industrial equipment can be used to farm food, which can be produced in great abundance with minimal labor needed, so that it becomes available to all very cheaply or even freely.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Policy: Food Policy - Strict Rationing
Unlocks Policy: Food Policy - Dietary Balance
Unlocks Policy: Food Policy - Nutritional Plenitude
name: Industrial Farming

description: Grown in fluidic space and hardened against the dangers of a non-fluidic universe.
name: Living Hull

description: The Tal Shiar is the elite intelligence agency of the Romulan Star Empire. Its purpose is guarding the security of the Empire, both from the Romulans' interstellar enemies as well as from traitors within the Romulan population itself.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Type-3 Tal Shiar Operatives
Unlocks Component: Type-4 Tal Shiar Operatives
Unlocks Component: Type-5 Tal Shiar Operatives
Unlocks Component: Type-6 Tal Shiar Operatives
Unlocks Component: Type-7 Tal Shiar Operatives
Unlocks Component: Type-8 Tal Shiar Operatives
Unlocks Component: Type-9 Tal Shiar Operatives
Unlocks Component: Type-10 Tal Shiar Operatives
Unlocks Component: Type-12 Tal Shiar Operatives
name: Tal Shiar

description: Some worlds are just ideal for the production of food, with ideal temperate bands across much of the surface. One of these worlds could export enough food to feed billions.
name: The Breadbasket

description: Large-scale nanite fabrication ensures that the Collective has all the resources it requires.
name: Nanite Fabrication

description: The transformation of nanites allows for the programming within each nanite to be interchangeable, from a nanite that flows through a drone, to a nanite that flows through the waste nutrient tubes.
name: Nanite Transformation

description: It is time for our economy to expand throughout the rest of the galaxy. To facilitate galactic trade opportunities, we must develop a universal form of currency between many different empires. Remember Ferengi Rule of Acquisition #9: 'Opportunity, plus instinct, equals profit.'
name: Universal Currency

description: Digital commerce is the buying and selling of goods and services using networks and commerce infrastructure.
name: Digital Commerce

description: Espionage, otherwise known as the practice of spying or of using spies, typically by governments to obtain political and military information.
name: Basic Espionage

description: The adaptation of healthcare to outer space and otherworldly bodies.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Edict: Starfleet First Contact Protocols
name: Frontier Health

description: Colonies all have different needs at differing levels of development. Researching the colonisation process allows for any bottlenecks in colonisation to be fixed and the process to be smoothed out.
name: Bureau of Colonial Affairs

description: Colonization of worlds with an oxygen-nitrogen base requires very little in the way of terraforming.
name: M-Class Colonization

description: The temperatures of Tholia are ideal for the crystalline bodies of the Tholian, one that can only be matched by Demon class planets.
name: Hostile Planet Colonisation

description: Bio-worlds are neither planets nor living organisms, but a mysterious mix of the two. Found in Fluidic Space these strange worlds harbour never seen before lifeforms and home to the Undine.
name: Bio-World Colonisation

description: Hive clusters are distributed computing environments used to process next generation sequencing and other biological data.
name: Hive Cluster

description: The creation of power supplies that provide life to Automated Personnel Units was once restricted to the Creators, before they were Protected.
name: Chromodynamic Power Battery

description: Creation of a new protocol for a Borg Queen will allow this high functioning Borg to focus the drones and bring order to chaos.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Building: Drone Repurposing Centre I
name: Queen Chamber

description: The initial breach from the safe life giving fluids into this dark vast coldness filled with metal.
name: The Breach

description: Colonies all have different needs at differing levels of development. Researching the colonisation process allows for any bottlenecks in colonisation to be fixed and the process to be smoothed out.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Building: Altar of the Prophets
Unlocks Building: Altar of the Holy Order
name: Bureau of Colonial Affairs

description: Voidspawn eggs have evolved to withstand the harsh conditions of space by absorbing and conserving energy from their nearest star.
name: Gargantuan Evolution

description: Our economy is thriving, but there are ways to make it prosper even more. Let us further those gains by investing into a building that can only help grow our prosperity by allowing an influx of new goods to trade with other empires and our colonies within our borders.
name: Galactic Merchant Association

description: %C/O%
name: Solar Panel Network

description: The realization of faster-than-light travel is a new dawn for space exploration. Manned missions to other star systems are now not only possible, but necessary.
name: Space Exploration

description: The FTL breakthrough allowed early attempts to adapt traditional surface-to-space shuttle frames to military applications to finally create relatively small, fast, and maneuverable vessels with limited firepower.
name: Corvettes

description: The Starbase is a planet's foothold in space, a centre for trade and commerce, as well as home base for military and civilian vessels.
name: Starbase Construction

description: The earliest starbases were little more than makeshift outposts. Permanent starports will enable us to maintain a firmer grip on star systems.
name: Starport

description: When exploration turns to interstellar war, we require more people to defend our worlds and conquer those of our enemies. As these armies will be larger than any our civilisation has previously fielded, we need to revolutionise how we think about organising, training, supplying, and deploying them. The establishment of an 'Interplanetary Expeditionary Force' is the first step towards this goal.
name: Interplanetary Expeditionary Forces

description: %C/O%
name: Armor

description: Nuclear fusion is the process of combining atoms to create larger atoms. When this occurs, energy is released. Thus, nuclear fusion reactors create incredibly hot plasma. This plasma has many uses. One such use is to expel it from a spacecraft, providing significantly more thrust than a chemical burn thruster. Miniaturising these thrusters allows them to be used in missiles and torpedoes.
name: Micro-fusion Thrusters

description: This will enable the construction of defensive deep space platforms to protect our Starbases.
name: Deep Space Defenses

description: The basic industrial infrastructure that is required to become a spacefaring civilisation.
name: Industrial Mining

description: The application of mechanical engineering to mineral extraction is a fundamental requirement for any industrial society.
name: Mechanized Mining

description: Orbital satellites around a planetary body allow for a criss-crossing network that can cover the entire surface.
name: Geocentric Orbit Construction

description: These electromagnetic projectile launchers use magnets to accelerate armor-piercing rounds towards targets at high speeds.
name: Mass Drivers

description: Gun batteries that fire shrapnel rounds at close range. They are particularly lethal to enemy strike craft, but can also defend against missiles.
name: Flak Battery

description: Space-to-space missiles equipped with high-yield nuclear warheads. Although based on old pre-space technology, these crude fire-and-forget weapons can be surprisingly effective at range.
name: Nuclear Missiles

description: The mind is in many ways a reflection of the universe itself, a microcosmos. All species may not reach this insight, but their minds are tools greater than any other.
name: Psionic Theory

description: Volatile Motes are fickle particles that are dangerous to work with. In order to safely harvest them without setting off a chain-reaction of explosions, energy fields must be used to stabilize the motes.
name: Mote Stabilization

description: Pockets of Exotic Gas are rare and often inaccessible by conventional means. Such deposits can only be reached by using special extractor technology.
name: Exotic Gas Extraction

description: Mining these crystals without damaging or even destroying them is an extremely delicate process. It requires advanced equipment capable of pinpoint precision.
name: Rare Crystal Mining

description: Mining and processing the rare living metals is exceedingly difficult, but successful application of the mutable alloys yields incomparable advantages.
name: Living Metal

description: An extremely rare aerosol of exotic particles. It has been deposited on a number of worlds through meteor impacts, but its true origin is a mystery. If ingested by psionically-gifted individuals, Zro acts as a very potent (and addictive) drug that enhances Psi abilities.
name: Zro Distillation

description: This exotic substance has many properties that seemingly defy the laws of physics. Harvestable concentrations can only be found near Black Holes or in certain nebulas.
name: Dark Matter Drawing

description: To complete construction projects of truly staggering scales we must first achieve a fundamental understanding of both the engineering and resource storage requirements for such megastructures.
name: Mega-Engineering

description: Equipped with a personality, synthetics will finally be able to interact socially on equal terms with the rest of our citizens. Some units may even assume leadership roles.
name: Synthetic Personality Matrix

description: Careful reproductive planning should be incentivized, lest we waste valuable genetic legacies.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Policy: Leader Enhancement - Selected Lineages
name: Selected Lineages

description: We leave nothing to chance, no matter the cost. Through exacting curation of DNA banks do we build the leaders of tomorrow.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Policy: Leader Enhancement - Capacity Boosters
name: Capacity Boosters

description: There are many alien empires who would gladly seize our worlds for themselves. We must be prepared for them, should the worst come to pass.
name: Ground Defense Planning

description: The ability to alter a planet's weather patterns to suppress destructive weather phenomena will make residential buildings easier to maintain and open up new areas for habitation.
name: Weather Control Systems

description: With directional gravity technology, buildings on the surface of planets can reach higher than ever before without risking structural collapse. The sky is the limit!
name: Anti-Gravity Engineering

description: Through the establishment of weather-controlled rural communes, we can support a larger population without disrupting our agrarian way of life.
name: Agrarian Utopias

description: Are the precognitive powers of Numa at work or is it a matter of skilled craftsmanship? Either way this galactic stock market prediction model will forecast fluctuations in the economy with divine accuracy.
name: Numistic Data Modeling

description: Standardization of assembly templates allow for improved specialization of the drone population.
name: Machine Template System

description: Rewritable assembly templates allow for the creation of bespoke synthetic worker designs.
name: Machine Template System

description: By advancing our understanding of atmospheric transformation, we will be able to terraform even the most ecologically devastated worlds.
name: Climate Restoration

description:
£building  §BPower Plant§!

Powered by biological material, the bio reactor is a relatively clean generator of energy.
name: Bio Reactor

description: The crystallization process is complicated and difficult, but synthetic crystals can be manufactured by using specialized industrial plants.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Building: Gamma-Radiation Synthetic Dilithium Manufactury
name: Rare Crystal Manufacturing

description: Exotic Gas can be produced artificially, but it is a difficult process that requires advanced refinery equipment.
name: Exotic Gas Refining

description: Aside from the obvious safety concerns, the artificial creation of Volatile Motes is an extremely delicate and complicated process that requires highly specialized equipment.
name: Volatile Material Plants

description: The application of mechanical engineering to mineral extraction is a fundamental requirement for any industrial society.
name: Mechanized Mining

description: Large-scale industrial farms growing nutrient-rich produce allows a civilization to grow its population manifold.
name: Industrial Agriculture

description: Through the development of special penal worlds, criminals can be rehabilitated through honest, hard labor. Some may be in need of permanent rehabilitation.
name: Penal Colonies

description: Through the creation of special slave-breeding worlds, we can ensure that we will always have a steady supply of disposable laborers.
name: Thrall-Worlds

description: With careful study devoted to landscaping, climate control, and the science of fun,  construction of entire worlds dedicated to leisure can be made possible.
name: Resort Worlds

description: With the advent of clean fusion, automation, and matter compression technologies, it was only a matter of time before mountain top removal became mountain range removal.
name: Planetary Resurfacing

description: Advances in material technology and deep-shaft mining techniques allow geo-engineering at previously unthinkable depths and temperatures. Magma hotspots can now be exploited, suppressed, or even relocated.
name: Deep Crust Engineering

description: Tactical disruption of natural habitats combined with converging search-and-destroy patterns can effectively eliminate hostile wildlife in a very short span of time.
name: Dangerous Wildlife Removal

description: Thorough cataloging, gene sequencing, and computer modeling of exobotanical ecosystems, coupled with gene editing and dispersal mechanisms, will allow us to reshape alien plant communities to our liking.
name: Selective Defoliants

description: Given enough processing power, networked sensors and distributed stations, even the ocean currents can be managed to a fine level of control.
name: Ocean Ecology Management

description: Many planets exhibit extensive subsurface voids. Subterranean exploration, exploitation, and construction techniques can greatly increase the habitable area of some worlds.
name: Subterranean Colonization

description: The process of soil deposition normally takes millions of years. With advanced fracking, chemical engineering, and hydraulic management technologies even the poorest substrate can be turned into fertile topsoil.
name: Soil Remediation

description: Sapient races have been reclaiming swampland for thousands of years. A coordinated system of modular aquaducts, pump stations, chemical remediation crawlers and automated soil compactors can reclaim land at unprecedented speeds.
name: Xeno-Hydraulic Mastery

description: Orbital systems of mirrors and shades can effect dramatic changes in planetary climates, when managed properly.
name: Climate Control Network

description: The Xaheans have productionized their Dilithium Incubator, which will provide a positive boost to our Dilithium production by recrystallizing dilithium.
name: Production Ready Dilithium incubator
weight_modifiers:
(×0.1)  Number of years since game start is NOT greater than 0
(×1.25)  Research Leader (Engineering):
    •   Is Industry Expert

description: The Starbase is a planet's foothold in space, a centre for trade and commerce, as well as home base for military and civilian vessels.
name: Starbase Construction

description: Research into improvements for civilian infrastructure is of vital importance to a growing empire. The more civilian population behind our efforts, the more rapid our expansion and exploitation of resources can be.
name: Civilian Infrastructure

description: As warp travel starts to become an established technology, many new starship designs will need to be created to exploit its potential. The Starship-Class of primary hull, armed with beam weapon ports and torpedo launchers, represents our first attempt at designing a general-purpose starship. As we gain experience with space travel and combat, new roles within our fleets will open up.
name: Starship Construction (Beam Weapons)

description: The invention of the warp drive opens up new possibilities for our civilisation, both peaceful and violent. The Bird of Prey class of vessel will allow us to bring powerful cannons to bear on any who dare violate our space. They will project the strength and fury of our hearts upon the homes of our enemies. In time we will need to conceive larger and specialised ships to maintain our dominance.
name: Starship Construction (Cannon Weapons)

description: Patrol frigates are our first line of defense against spacefaring enemies. Although they are equipped with relatively weak armaments, they are rather mobile and are quite cheap and quick to produce.
name: Patrol Frigate Blueprints

description: Efficient usage of limited resources results in a small, flexible, expendable package designed to seek out new resources for the Collective. Extolling the nature of the Collective where no individual is worth more than the whole.
name: The Versatility of the Probe

description: The universe of non-fluidic space is alien to us, and our vessels require adaptation to be able to survive in the absence of fluid.
name: Life among Death

description: Orbital satellites around a planetary body allow for a criss-crossing network that can cover the entire surface.
name: Geocentric Orbit Construction

description: Designed to offer full targeting capabilities across a wide spectrum, the defense grid is a powerful deterrent.
name: Unimatrix Defense Grid

description: Creation of static defenses that do not travel with the currents of fluidic space has been a challenge. A potential solution is a breached anchor, ensuring the defences remain static.
name: Dimensional Breach Anchored Defenses

description: Many of the lower mammalian life forms found in the galaxy do not understand our Doctrine and true place in the galaxy. Our space must be kept clean of these primitive races, and to do that, we require a vessel that can patrol and defend our borders with impunity.
name: The Guardian at our Borders

description: Doctrine states that we were the first intelligent beings to evolve in this region of space, and as such as we have an ancient and rightful claim over it. Non-indigenous beings have no rights, and with that in mind, we require a vessel that can enforce our power over those that seek to disrupt Doctrine.
name: Memories of Power Lost

description: Our manifest destiny and claim over all space is written in the very annals of Doctrine. Our special virtues, our belief and our irresistible destiny to expand across the stars requires vessels of tremendous power and size. These flagships will bring Doctrine to every arm of the galaxy.
name: Our Glory, Manifest

description: By linking numerous stationary weapon turrets and planetary defenses through one grid, targeting by one sensor could mean that all weapons could fire upon it.
name: Coordinated System Defenses Initiative

description: The initial Warp Delta designs call for a triangular hull with two warp nacelles situated above the hull. Major research and development is required to undertake these first steps into the unknown.
name: Emmette-Type Frigate

description: The iconic saucer and twin-nacelle system are just some of the unique Starfleet Design Principles that ship design is based upon. Whilst some designs deviate from this, the core design remains the same as it has since the beginning.
name: Starfleet Design Principles

description: Glory should not be shared so easily, and our vessels should exemplify that. Small, yet powerful, vessels should allow our warriors to test their honour and seek glory for the Empire.
name: Borghel-Class Bird of Prey

description: As warriors of Kahless, we seek glory for our House and our Empire. This expands to our ship design, where ships are crewed by small crews rather than sharing the glory amongst a large one.
name: Warriors of Kahless Design Principles

description: Named after a small but nimble bird of prey, this is an early Romulan ship design.
name: Rea Class Bird of Prey

description: The principles behind the Romulan Star Empire require a navy that exemplifies those values.
name: Romulan Navy Design Priinciples

description: The basic industrial infrastructure that is required to become a spacefaring civilisation.
name: Industrial Mining

description: Dilithium is a critical component for all but the most rudimentary of warp core designs. Like any resource, it requires a degree of processing before it can be used. By improving our mining techniques, we should be able to locate foreign sources of dilithium and mine them via our mining stations.
name: Refining Techniques

description: By creating adjoining colony buttresses to the main colony hub we can increase the amount of civilian housing on the planet, utilising the resources of all other adjoining buttresses.
name: Urban Planning

description: The industrial hive is a foundry where each manufacturing plant is located in order to minimise downtime due to transportation of goods.
name: Industrial Hive

description: When main systems go down it can often prove fatal for those onboard. Emergency systems can be introduced to give a window of opportunity to restore the main systems and provide security for those onboard.
name: Emergency Backup Systems

description: Most species would consider metal incapable of being alive; however, we are not so small minded. By using nanoprobes and matter-energy conversion technology, we can tend to our metal hulls in the same way than an organic body tends to its skin. With some further experimentation we can refine the implementation of this technology.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Type-1 Living Metallic Hull
Unlocks Component: Type-2 Living Metallic Hull
Unlocks Component: Type-3 Living Metallic Hull
Unlocks Component: Type-4 Living Metallic Hull
Unlocks Component: Type-5 Living Metallic Hull
Unlocks Component: Type-6 Living Metallic Hull
Unlocks Component: Type-7 Living Metallic Hull
Unlocks Component: Type-8 Living Metallic Hull
Unlocks Component: Type-9 Living Metallic Hull
Unlocks Component: Type-10 Living Metallic Hull
Unlocks Component: Type-12 Living Metallic Hull
Unlocks Component: Type-14 Living Metallic Hull
Unlocks Component: Type-18 Living Metallic Hull
Unlocks Component: Type-20 Living Metallic Hull
name: Living Metallic Hull

description: Titanium is a strong, ductile, low-density, lightweight metal that is quite reflective. With these impressive qualities, titanium is a good material to make our ship hulls from until we inevitably find a better material.
name: Titanium Hull

description: When exploration turns to interstellar war, we require more people to defend our worlds and conquer those of our enemies. As these armies will be larger than any our civilisation has previously fielded, we need to revolutionise how we think about organising, training, supplying, and deploying them. The establishment of an 'Interplanetary Expeditionary Force' is the first step towards this goal.
name: Interplanetary Expeditionary Forces

description: Nuclear fusion is the process of combining atoms to create larger atoms. When this occurs, energy is released. Thus, nuclear fusion reactors create incredibly hot plasma. This plasma has many uses. One such use is to expel it from a spacecraft, providing significantly more thrust than a chemical burn thruster. Miniaturising these thrusters allows them to be used in missiles and torpedoes.
name: Micro-fusion Thrusters

description: Our vessels hull designs are based on simple geometric shapes. They have multiple axis of symmetry, no real front or back. It would be inefficient to limit ourselves to a single direction of motion as most species do, we are capable of more. Thrusters exhaust ports can be mounted on each hull surface and feed by a decentralised network of impulse plasma generator nodes.
name: Omni-Directional Impulse

description: Advances in material construction allow for drills and tunnels to reach further into a planet's surface. By breaking through the crust and mantle, we may be able to access materials deep within the core.
name: Deep Core Mining

description: Complex replicator units can be installed across entire structures, allowing for improved access to tools, replacements, or upgrades.
name: Nano Replicators

description: Dilithium is a critical component for all but the most rudimentary of warp core designs. Like any resource, it requires a degree of processing before it can be used. Initial studies suggest that distilling the ore slowly with exposure to multi-vector, low-energy, incoherent nadion pulses will dissolve impurities without significant damage to the dilithium lattice.
name: Dilithium Distillation

description: Our engineers continue to come up with new and exciting designs, that are ready to take shape outside of our solar system. We should continue to expand upon these projects to offworld areas, as the more we build, the more we learn.
name: Offworld Construction

description: Early experiments into temporal mechanics offer numerous potential branches, with one interesting branch found with regards to phased explosives. By destabilizing spacetime in a localised area, we can disrupt the very fabric of the universe, destroying whatever is in that location.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy  Temporal Warhead
name: Early Temporal Warhead

description: It has been decided to improve our tactical options by developing a new weapon: a torpedo-style, variable-yield explosive charge. A suitable explosive was assimilated from species 658, propulsion system from species 337. Records indicate that 89% of species encountered use a metallic substance in their vessel's hull, this will be exploited for the guidance mechanism.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Magnetometric Charge
name: Magnetometric Charge

description: Polarons are a quasiparticle with an unexpected quality: they can partially penetrate shields. In the initial testing environment, enriching the warheads with different subatomic particles results in different effects.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Miniaturised Early Polaron Torpedo
Unlocks Component: Light Early Polaron Torpedo
Unlocks Component: Medium Early Polaron Torpedo
Unlocks Component: Heavy Early Polaron Torpedo
Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Early Polaron Torpedo
name: Early Polaron Torpedo

description: These warheads resonate at such high frequencies at the quantum level, and with such intensity, that shields are virtually useless against them. Torpedoes equipped with these warheads would make for very effective shield draining weapons.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy  Resonance Torpedo
name: Resonance Torpedo

description: Nuclear torpedoes use fissile material to create a powerful explosion. This explosive can be used as a warhead and can be put on top a missile and loaded and fired at a target.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Nuclear Torpedo
name: Nuclear Torpedo

description: An antimatter weapon was a device using antimatter as a power source, as a propellant, or as an explosive, in the case of the theoretical photon torpedo.
name: Principles of Antimatter Warhead Weaponry

description: Early photonic torpedoes are the next step in antimatter warhead torpedo designs. They feature a more potent warhead than spatial torpedoes, and launch speeds can be increased due to lower mass requirements.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Miniaturised Basic Photonic Torpedo
Unlocks Component: Light Basic Photonic Torpedo
Unlocks Component: Medium Basic Photonic Torpedo
Unlocks Component: Heavy Basic Photonic Torpedo
Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Basic Photonic Torpedo
name: Early Photonic Torpedo

description: Nuclear fusion is a reaction in which two or more atomic nuclei come close enough to form one or more different atomic nuclei and subatomic particles with the difference in mass between the reactants and products manifesting as the release of large amounts of energy, ideal for warheads for our vessels.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Fusion Warhead
name: Fusion Warhead

description: A plasma weapon is a type of direct energy particle weapon that used plasma as a means of inflicting damage to the target.
feature_unlocks: Unlocks Component: Very Heavy Plasma Torpedo
name: Principles of Plasma Warhead Weaponry

description: Using chemical processes produced naturally by the bioships Undine vessels are able to prepel themselves along at sub warp speeds.

description: Impulse thrusters vent high energy plasma to provide thrust. There are two main distinctions between them and fusion thrusters. Impulse thrusters can use plasma from a warp core in addition to a fusion reactor, and they generally use a more complex exhaust manifold to greatly increase their efficiency. By further developing this technology, we can achieve even greater sublight speeds.
name: High-Gain Impulse Thruster
weight_modifiers:
(×1.25)  Research Leader (Engineering):
    •   Is Materials Expert

description: Low temperature thrusters have a lower top speed, but make up for it with a smaller sensor footprint. This is useful during combat were tracking a fast, evasive starship, which is equipped with a variety of countermeasures, can be difficult. When these thrusters fire, it takes marginally longer for a hostile ship to isolate their signature, increasing the chance that an evasive move will succeed.
name: Low Temperature Thruster
